review: Excellent Doctor !! Had met with a road accident that resulted in left forearm bone fracture & which required surgery with metal plates to be inserted. Consider extremely fortunate to have landed in the safe hands of Dr. Ravi.  Explained in detail the injury/ surgery to be done and most importantly very approachable and a great comfort level.  Perfect diagnosis too, had a nerve compression in my right hand & it was  Doctor who identified it and put us on to a Neurologist to sort things. My physiotherapy is on at present and with Dr. Ravi around very confident of coming back to my usual self very soon. Highly recommended. Go ahead even without any second thoughts !!

Awesome doctor. There was a miscommunication at the hospital but the doctor measaged us and spoke with us directly to sort things out. He was very kind and spent time with us asking meaningful question to diagnose the ailment. Very knowledgable and highly educated. We would highly recommend this doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly and listening health problems with patience and clearing all the doubts on my issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He explained me the problem in friendly manner. *** ** **** *** **** *********.we like the way he talk to us.

****** *** ***** But he wrote a prescription with three medicines for 5 days. He said "sister will explain." This sister brought those medicines and explained. She was giving 2 of the medicines for 10 days. When I said doctor has written only for 5 days, she got irritated and was answering impatiently. Then after sometime, she said she can't cut the strip and asked me to buy them outside. I said I ll pay for the consultation and buy the other medicine also outside, for which she rudely answered, "buy if u can"..I don't understand why she became rude when I didn't buy all the medicines ...they were not even giving a bill for the medicines..what's wrong if I buy outside...rude behaviour was a big turn off for me

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I came to know him by a friend, and when i met him for the first time itself i was very much confident and comfortable with *** ********* ** *** ** diagnosis and surgery. am writing this review after three years of  knee surgery. Acl graft reconstruction, these surgeries can be a success  only when graft is positioned properly. Dr had done it very perfectly and now  i am able to run and do all my exercises. i strongly recommend Dr Ravi as he is very talented doctor and also a Good Person
As this was an emergency situation....he have even advanced our appointment to 2 pm...Experienced person...able to diagnose the problem quickly...very practical  in consultation...
Good suggestions and treatment plan.  Doctor has explained to us so that we can easily understand the problem

Excellent... Friendly doctor.clinic is so organized....The diagnostic tests were so accurate..

I   was  treated  well. And I am happy about the service...
Awesome...Doctor is so nice, listening very patiencely... The clinic looks very modern and nice. Feels to visit again for Yoga therapy.... Staff were so professional... Excellent clinic in Chennai...
